sentences.english: Fleeing the great flock that Destiny has folded.
sentences.chinese: 逃离了被命运圈起的巨大的羊群。

sentences.english: The defeated soldiers reaved the villagers of their flocks of sheep.
sentences.chinese: 败兵抢走了村民的羊群。

sentences.english: A dog that molests sheep has to be killed.
sentences.chinese: 必须杀死骚扰羊群的狗。

sentences.english: Close the gate of the pen properly to prevent the sheep from getting away.
sentences.chinese: 把羊圈关好，防备羊群跑掉。

sentences.english: What was that big dark animal coming towards his flock?
sentences.chinese: 那是什么动物大黑对他的羊群来了吗？

sentences.english: A flock of white ibis stands in marsh grass on Dry Bread Island in St. Bernard Parish, Louisiana on Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 阿白鹮羊群中的干面包草洲湿地站在圣伯纳德教区。

sentences.english: He hopes to pass a wolf the lamb glom on to in adjacent Yang Qun.
sentences.chinese: 他希望通过狼把邻近羊群中的小羊据为己有。

sentences.english: He digs potatoes and helps with the sheep dipping.
sentences.chinese: 他挖土豆并帮忙给羊群洗药浴。

sentences.english: He put on the pelt, wearing it like a coat. Then the wolf walked among the sheep like he was one of them.
sentences.chinese: 它像穿外套一样披上羊皮，然后假装成羊走进羊群中。

sentences.english: The cattle were herded into the barn by the shepherd.
sentences.chinese: 牧羊人把羊群赶进了农舍。

sentences.english: My sheep also need my protection.
sentences.chinese: 我的羊群也需要我的保护。

sentences.english: Sheep and cattle graze on the hillsides.
sentences.chinese: 山坡上有羊群和牛群在吃草。

sentences.english: Finally, one day a wolf really came and began to kill the sheep.
sentences.chinese: 终于有一天，狼真的来了，窜入羊群，大肆咬杀。

sentences.english: You should graze your flock on this side.
sentences.chinese: 你应放牧你的羊群到河的这岸。

sentences.english: So peaceful the birds and the sheep.
The wolf ravished the lamb from the flock .
sentences.chinese: 狼把小羊从羊群中攫走。
